channel.title: Comments on: Baby Iâ€™ve got to prove it
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: in all my years boating i've never seen the likes of this. usually the boaters i see are holding beer or pop. i hope all those gadgets are waterproof. shouldn't ya'll be water-skiing or swimming or having a beach picnic? i mean really, no bathing suits? you're a disgrace to boaters everywhere. (but you do the nerd herd proud) glad you had '"fun"? (real boating rules dictate removal of all accessories, including glasses, and use of towels and/or swim suits. and aloe and tanning lotion or oil.) no speedos though, please. ;)
item.content:encoded: in all my years boating i’ve never seen the likes of this. usually the boaters i see are holding beer or pop. i hope all those gadgets are waterproof. shouldn’t ya’ll be water-skiing or swimming or having a beach picnic? i mean really, no bathing suits? you’re a disgrace to boaters everywhere. (but you do the nerd herd proud) glad you had ‘”fun”? (real boating rules dictate removal of all accessories, including glasses, and use of towels and/or swim suits. and aloe and tanning lotion or oil.) no speedos though, please. ðŸ˜‰
